name: Erebe
description:
Erebe is a 1v1 PvP competitive Online Card Game available for free on PC. The focus is on simultaneity, with players having to make important decisions at the same time, and interactivity, giving competitors the means to react to their opponent' actions.

Set in the lands of Gounes, Erebe tells the story of truly interesting heroes from four Factions. The inhabitants of Gounes manipulate different types of magic, the Affiliations, inherited from the great Mythical Creatures: Phoenix, Kraken, Zephyr and Sphinx.





Innovative Gameplay

Each phase of a turn is played simultaneously with the opponent. Anticipate his decisions to plan your strategy and thwart his offensives! At the beginning of each round, you draw until you have 5 cards in your hand which gives you a wide range of options. Finally you also need a good management of your mana, which is conserved between each turn, if you want to play epic and devastating cards.


[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/steam_sample_en.png[/img]

Powerful Heroes

Whether you want to be a terrifying Dragon, an unstoppable warrior, a bloodthirsty Demon, or a powerful magician, you can play the Hero of your choice. Each one has its own characteristics, stats and story. The Hero also influences your deckbuilding by imposing cards of his own, but also by giving you access to cards of his Faction and Affiliation.



Wonderful Endless Universe

Travel through the Lands of Gounes to soak up the specificities of each of its regions. Discover countless characters and their stories on your way. The universe of Erebe is wide and bound to grow over time.

Free-2-Play

You don't have to pay to progress! Every time you win games, complete quests or level up your Hero, you earn rewards to expand your collection. In Erebe's Pit, it's not the one who pays who wins, it's the one who plays the best!
